review: Pro: pipes in video & music excellently; voice commands work; easy set up; unobtrusive sleek box; intuitive remote.Cons: always on, tracking internet usage apparently; voice commands don't work so well for someone with an accent; too much defaulting to pay per view/subscription services.Normally use it to look at youtube: old movies & tv shows; could have better navigation for this type of usage.
author: M. Buckley

review: Its an adjustment from cable but getting use to it. Like not having to pay to watch endless commercials and like being to watch something when we want too.
author: Rick

review: I love it.  Since I already had amazon prime I went with the Fire TV when I decided to cut the cord.  I am very happy I went with the Amazon Fire TV.

review: Everything I expected! Works great. Easy to use.

review: Great device and has exceeded my expectations. I have it wired to router and it works flawlessly but I haven't tried the wireless connectivity yet. The voice activated search feature on the remote works amazingly well too. I believe this unit surpasses any of the competition thus far :))
